# Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.DateSeparator.omitted

**Case**

Specifies no separator between the year, month, and day components in an ISO 8601 date format style.

## Declaration

```swift
case omitted
```

## Discussion

The rawValue of `omitted` is “\n”.

## Specifying ISO 8601 Format Style Date Separators

- **Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.DateSeparator.dash**: Specifies a dash character separating year, month, and day components in an ISO 8601 date format style.
